PASCHA NOSTRUM: Christ Our Passover
heading: subheading

PASCHA NOSTRUM: Officiant and People, all standing
heading: rubric

PASCHA NOSTRUM: Alleluia. Christ our Passover has been sacrificed for us; *
heading: "congregation"

PASCHA NOSTRUM: therefore let us keep the feast,
heading: "congregation"

PASCHA NOSTRUM: Not with the old leaven, the leaven of malice and evil, *
heading: "congregation"

PASCHA NOSTRUM: but with the unleavened bread of sincerity and truth. Alleluia.
heading: "congregation"

PASCHA NOSTRUM: Christ being raised from the dead will never die again; *
heading: "congregation"

PASCHA NOSTRUM: death no longer has dominion over him.
heading: "congregation"

PASCHA NOSTRUM: The death that he died, he died to sin, once for all; *
heading: "congregation"

PASCHA NOSTRUM: but the life he lives, he lives to God.
heading: "congregation"

PASCHA NOSTRUM: So also consider yourselves dead to sin, *
heading: "congregation"

PASCHA NOSTRUM: and alive to God in Jesus Christ our Lord. Alleluia.
heading: "congregation"

PASCHA NOSTRUM: Christ has been raised from the dead, *
heading: "congregation"

PASCHA NOSTRUM: the firstfruits of those who have fallen asleep.
heading: "congregation"

PASCHA NOSTRUM: For since by a man came death, *
heading: "congregation"

PASCHA NOSTRUM: by a man has come also the resurrection of the dead.
heading: "congregation"

PASCHA NOSTRUM: For as in Adam all die, *
heading: "congregation"

PASCHA NOSTRUM: so also in Christ shall all be made alive. Alleluia.
heading: "congregation"

PASCHA NOSTRUM: 1 Corinthians 5:7-8
heading: "citation"

PASCHA NOSTRUM: Romans 6:9-11
heading: "citation"

PASCHA NOSTRUM: 1 Corinthians 15:20-22
heading: "citation"
